The mixture was filtered, and a green, clear solution was obtained; dark green crystals of <ce:bold>1</ce:bold> were formed upon standing of the filtrate at room temperature 2 days (9.8<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg 28.2%). <ce:italic>Anal.</ce:italic> Calc. for C<ce:inf loc="post">14</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">11</ce:inf>CuN<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf> (348.80): C, 48.17; H, 3.15; N, 12.04. Found: C, 48.32; H, 3.01; N, 12.20%.</ce:para><ce:section-title>{[Cu(mal)(tpy)]<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>·<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>4H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O}<ce:inf loc="post">n</ce:inf> (<ce:bold>2</ce:bold>)</ce:section-title><ce:para view="all">Complex <ce:bold>2</ce:bold> was prepared similar to <ce:bold>1</ce:bold>. A suspension of maleate Cu(II) salt (17.8<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg, 1<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol) and tpy (23.8<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg, 1<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol) in methanol solution (15<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL) were stirred at room temperature until all the starting materials had dissolved and formed a dark green, clear solution that was immediately filtered; dark green crystals of <ce:bold>2</ce:bold> were formed upon standing of the filtrate at room temperature 3 days (35.3<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg 73.1%). <ce:italic>Anal</ce:italic>. Calc. for C<ce:inf loc="post">19</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">21</ce:inf>CuN<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">8</ce:inf> (482.93): C, 47.21; H, 4.35; N, 8.70. clean_text:
Syntheses of the complexes

[Cu(mal)(Hdpa)] n  (1)

A suspension of maleate Cu(II) salt (17.8mg, 1mmol) and Hdpa (19.2mg, 1mmol) in methanol solution (10mL) were stirred at room temperature until all the starting materials had dissolved and were replaced with a green powdery precipitate. The mixture was filtered, and a green, clear solution was obtained; dark green crystals of 1 were formed upon standing of the filtrate at room temperature 2 days (9.8mg 28.2%). Anal. Calc. for C14H11CuN3O4 (348.80): C, 48.17; H, 3.15; N, 12.04. Found: C, 48.32; H, 3.01; N, 12.20%.

{[Cu(mal)(tpy)]⋅4H2O}n (2)

Complex 2 was prepared similar to 1. A suspension of maleate Cu(II) salt (17.8mg, 1mmol) and tpy (23.8mg, 1mmol) in methanol solution (15mL) were stirred at room temperature until all the starting materials had dissolved and formed a dark green, clear solution that was immediately filtered; dark green crystals of 2 were formed upon standing of the filtrate at room temperature 3 days (35.3mg 73.1%). Anal. Calc. for C19H21CuN3O8 (482.93): C, 47.21; H, 4.35; N, 8.70. Found: C, 47.32; H, 4.20; N, 8.66%.
